reviews.review: I honestly dont even know where to begin. Portal is a game of close observations and a ton of thinking and planing. If your into extreme puzzels and agrovating head aches or even the thought of losing your very mind this is your game. This is not even including the advanced levels you unlock after completeing the story, and when they say advanced their not fucking around. But overall in my own perspective of the game i found it to be a challenging yet satisfing game with after content that still keeps me going for those acheivements
Classic and wonderful.
Игра захватывает атмосферой в первую очередь...хотя я и не любитель подобных игр...но прошел Портал на одном дыхании...как 1ю часть так и вторуюю Рекомендую)
Fantastic game. Everyone should give this game a try. The only falt is that the game is way to short.
Muito divertido, principalmente a voz sarcastica te zoando durante o jogo.
Finale meraviglioso
this game is soooo fun
game
top
Fun 3D puzzle game that also has come comdy in it. Should get!
the first game that twisted my mind. made me think in 4D puzzle solving. made my brain hurt sometimes.
Great way to push your logical thinking! Love the game!

A wonderful game. Full of intresting puzzles, humorous turret qoutes, and a crazy AI trying to murder you. (SPOILERS!)
But really if you don't know the story to portal already I don't know what to say. 
So here's the lowdown.

Pros: Fun puzzles, physics, and a cool music score.
Cons: Challege Maps are extremely difficult and time/foot/portal challeges more so (more extreme difficulty on the latter) 

Other then that theres really not to much I can say about Portal that hasn't already been said. If you plan on buying Portal I can safely say its a great game to add to your collection.

τh3 cak3 ís a 131

English: Very fun puzzle game although it is not as good as Portal 2 it is still good and defenatly worth paying you will defenatly be able to find this game in a Steam sale soon and you should buy it when you do. In my review of Portal 2 I complained about how I thought that the game was too short, well this is also the case with this game, infact it is even shorter and even more limited but still worth playing. This game is a perfect example that Valve's reputation for making amazing games is still true!

العربية: لعبة ممتعة جدا اللغز على الرغم من أنه ليست جيدة كما أنها بوابة ٢ لا تزال جيدة ويستحق أن يدفع ديفيناتلي سوف تكون قادرة على العثور على ديفيناتلي هذه اللعبة في بيع البخار قريبا ويجب شرائه عند القيام به. في تقييمي من بوابة ٢ أنا اشتكى كيف اعتقدت أن اللعبة كانت قصيرة للغاية، وأيضا هذا هو الحال أيضا مع هذه اللعبة، حقيقة أنه حتى أقصر وأكثر محدودية  ولكن لا يزال يستحق اللعب. هذه اللعبة هو خير مثال على هذه السمعة صمام لصنع الالعاب مذهلة لا يزال صحيحا
Yes, yes, YES!

Reasons: 

1 - Portals. 

2 - Lore/story.

3 - Chamber challenges/speedrun (casual or serious).

4 - Cheats.

The advice I wish I'd knew was just don't play with tutorial, after you know the solution it's gonna take a long while for you to forget it. Even if you're stuck on the chamber, just don't, it's understandable on the advanced ones, but in story mode just avoid it at all costs. Also don't use cheats before finishing the story, unless you're a kid that loves to play with the stuff in the game, then you'll never forget how fun all of that was.
Le jeu auquel il faut avoir joué !
The cake is a lie!
Two hours well spent to finish story. I loved it. Awesome atmosphere, nice graphics. I'll give it 8.5/10 because it was very short. I'll definetely buy Portal 2!
One of the best games I have ever played!
Un jeu très sympa et simple , mais vraiment trop court et trop facile , mais pour faire durer ce jeu les défis et niveaux avancés sont super
It is amazing, amazingly challenging, not amazingly fast. It is a great puzzle game. I am amazed that it is basically just a game of theoretical physics and real-life physics.

Portal is an AMAZING Puzzle game! The levels start off easy and get harder. It doesn't have much of a story line but Portal 2 improves this. It is a genius idea and I would recommend it to almost anyone.
The only bad point is that it was quite a short game - only took me 5 hours to complete it all.

Un imprescindible. Siendo como es un juego de puzzles, el concepto de portales añadido a una ingeniosa mecánica de saltos apoyado en los cambios de gravedad hacen de este un juego muy entretenido. Hay puzzles muy complejos y desafiantes, y sobre todo, en muchos casos se pueden hacer las cosas de muchas maneras distintas, todo es usar los portales con imaginación.

El único fallo es que se hace tremendamente corto.

"Portal has been called one of the most innovative new games on the horizon and will offer gamers hours of unique gameplay"... Portal is a great game but it's just too easy to beat. It says hours of unique gameplay. I got about 2. Other than the short playtime the game is fun and the cake is good!
Fun game, great puzzles, creepy atmosphere, and funny commentary done by you-know-who. However I think the game is too short for full price. I would recommend this on a sale for more than 50% off.
it is awesome
Yes yes yes! I loved this game! Amazingly priced and packs a punch! Thank you Valve and Steam!

Great game

Short, but sweet is the best way to describe this game. It only lasts about 2 hours but is definetly worth purchasing. $10 might be a bit high for a game that short, so buy it with the orange box, or wait for a sale. (Usually goes for about .99 cents!)

Portal is a great concept for a game. This first game in the series really kicks it off, it is very short and it seems that there is a lack of content shortly after beating it with only a handful of bonus levels you can play. If you want to get into the series, I would buy this game, but if you want a longer puzzle game with lots of content, I would go ahead and buy Portal 2 instead.
Не для тупых.
This game is simply great. The atmosphere is calming, this short "story" is well made, and all in all, it's just great, in my opinion, even better than Portal 2.

Si vous avez aimés portal 2, et que vous en redemandez encore un tout petit peu, et que vous voulez savoir le début de l'épopée de Chell, hésitez pas à le prendre, surtout si il est en promo, les graphismes sont vraiment pas mauvais, les musiques et les sons très bons et les énigmes avancés vous donneront du fil à retordre, pour ce qui est de la durée de vie, comptez 3 heures pour le solo en mode pépère, et rajouter 2 à 3 heures en plus pour finir tout les succès.

Un jeu conseillé pour les fans de la saga ;)

My favorite game of all time, I would recommend to any person looking for a fun puzzle expierience.

Portal is a very good and addictive game I bought it when it was on sale in a bundle with Portal 2 and so far it was worth the money that I paid. The game is just really fun to play and has a very good story line but the only downside to the game is that it only took me around 3 hours to complete but all in all it is a very good game.

This game is pretty fun. Lots of challenges and they get harder the further you get into the game. I like all the commentary in Portal, it really adds to it, as opposed to you just solving puzzles. It can be a bit stressful when you can't figure out a puzzle, but for the most part it is a relaxing game. To make the most of it, don't just try to solve the puzzles. Look around and observe the areas to really get into the storyline of the game, it makes the game more enjoyable and you start to question what you are really doing in the game.
good

you wake up in a puristic decorated room and you also have some leg or knee replacements (maybe you are born a cripple). There´s a giant robot which demands that you do some puzzles for her own entertainment ( sick little robot). She is lying, trying to kill you (with acid, little robot sentry guns and by lack of cake) and tries to prevent your escape. yes, she promised me a cake (i want my f**king cake). In the end you kinda "fist-fight" her, then she sings a song and threatens to kill you again. 
So 11/10 a normal saturday night.
An amazing game that could have used a little more story but was overall a great introduction to one of the greatest puzzel games ever made

You will be amazed and addicted to this cult-classic that has spawned a sequel, Portal 2. While the story is short, it is in-depth and fun with many mind-bending puzzles controlled by the passive/agressive A.I. GLaDOS. You are in controll of Chell, the main character who is the main test subject of Aperture Science Labratories. You are given advanced portal technology that can only be used on moon dust covered surfaces. Portal will keep you playing until the end. I recomend you read the comic "Lab Rat" which comes with the game. After you finish the story, you can do challenges such as, least steps taken, least portals, least time. You are promised cake with a party at the end; but is it a lie?
